At **Kākāpō Industries**, we bring the beauty of the natural world into your hands. Using cutting-edge 3D printing technology, we create **physical cartographic models**, specialising in **3D topography and bathymetry** that capture the stunning contours of our landscapes.

Whether you’re an environmental organisation, regional council, educator, or outdoor enthusiast, our models are perfect for showcasing terrain, visualising catchments, or simply celebrating the land we call home.

Explore the land like never before. 🌿 **Discover our models today.**
